ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 278
ygData.msgSnippet: Remember, Erudites are not an evil Race.  While this makes some of our stops a little easier, most evil races don t like us much.  I m an erudite necro as
ygData.messageBody:
Remember, Erudites are not an evil Race. While this makes some of our stops a little easier, most evil races don't like us much. I'm an erudite necro as well, and I'm able to trade at the gypsy camp in N. Karana. I would try N.K before I made a run to S. Ro.

Albon Darkfall

> before I run across the continent...
> as a wizard, collecting greater lightstones was a very attracticve pastime
> for exp and trading in NK. as an erudite necro, do I turn in lightstones
in
> NK or the 'evil' one (in South Ro, wasn't it?)
>
>
